text: @va_shiva @AmyHam20569604 @realDonaldTrump You misunderstand “death rate of observed cases” and “estimated death rate of the patient population” and compare former of seasonal flu and latter of COVID-19. While the latter of COVID-19 is 0.1%, that of seasonal flu is much lower.
